id.title: Id
id.description: the `game entity` represented by this sprite
id.markdownDescription: the `game entity` represented by this sprite

bg.title: Bg
bg.description: background sprite name, **always** a single value
bg.markdownDescription: background sprite name, **always** a single value

rotates.title: Rotates
rotates.description: true for things that rotate like vehicle parts
rotates.markdownDescription: true for things that rotate like vehicle parts

PlayerFemale.title: PlayerFemale
PlayerFemale.description: The special ids `"player_female"`, `"player_male"`, `"npc_female"`, `"npc_male"` are used to identify the sprites for the player avatar and NPCs.
PlayerFemale.markdownDescription: The special ids `"player_female"`, `"player_male"`, `"npc_female"`, `"npc_male"` are used to identify the sprites for the player avatar and NPCs.

PlayerMale.title: PlayerMale
PlayerMale.description: The special ids `"player_female"`, `"player_male"`, `"npc_female"`, `"npc_male"` are used to identify the sprites for the player avatar and NPCs.
PlayerMale.markdownDescription: The special ids `"player_female"`, `"player_male"`, `"npc_female"`, `"npc_male"` are used to identify the sprites for the player avatar and NPCs.

NpcFemale.title: NpcFemale
NpcFemale.description: The special ids `"player_female"`, `"player_male"`, `"npc_female"`, `"npc_male"` are used to identify the sprites for the player avatar and NPCs.
NpcFemale.markdownDescription: The special ids `"player_female"`, `"player_male"`, `"npc_female"`, `"npc_male"` are used to identify the sprites for the player avatar and NPCs.

NpcMale.title: NpcMale
NpcMale.description: The special ids `"player_female"`, `"player_male"`, `"npc_female"`, `"npc_male"` are used to identify the sprites for the player avatar and NPCs.
NpcMale.markdownDescription: The special ids `"player_female"`, `"player_male"`, `"npc_female"`, `"npc_male"` are used to identify the sprites for the player avatar and NPCs.

Unknown.title: Unknown
Unknown.description: The special id `"unknown"` provides a sprite that is displayed when an entity has no other sprite.
Unknown.markdownDescription: The special id `"unknown"` provides a sprite that is displayed when an entity has no other sprite.

MySeasonSpring.title: MySeasonSpring
MySeasonSpring.description: The special suffixes `_season_spring`, `_season_summer`, `_season_autumn`, and `_season_winter` can be applied to any entity id to create a seasonal variant for that entity that will be displayed in the appropriate season like this `"id": "mon_wolf_season_winter".`
MySeasonSpring.markdownDescription: The special suffixes `_season_spring`, `_season_summer`, `_season_autumn`, and `_season_winter` can be applied to any entity id to create a seasonal variant for that entity that will be displayed in the appropriate season like this `"id": "mon_wolf_season_winter".`
